WorkItem.Description:
I have the attached pdf

Calling PdfReader.Open on it just hangs indefinitely.

Here's a simple example in powershell (so that i don't have to send c# files):

```
W:\MyProject> [reflection.assembly]::LoadFile((resolve-path .\packages\PdfSharp.1.32.2602.0\lib\net20\PdfSharp.dll).Path)

GAC    Version        Location
---    -------        --------
False  v2.0.50727     W:\MyProject\packages\PdfSharp.1.32.2602.0\lib\net20\PdfSharp.dll


W:\MyProject> [pdfsharp.pdf.io.pdfreader]::Open("C:\Users\George\AppData\Local\Temp\Ogre\vgxvlnbh2mn\slide0.pdf")

```

This never returns. Same story calling it from C# or anywhere else
WorkItem.Summary: Hangs while importing a a simple pdf file

Comments.Message:
Other pdfs open just fine.

This particular one was generated by running the phantomjs rasterizer on an html page (which contained plenty of svg)
